alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New London and central Middlesex Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 407 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glastonbury, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Norwich, Colchester, East Hampton, Salem, Chester, Cromwell, Portland, East Haddam, Haddam, Lebanon, Westbrook, Bozrah, Lyme and North Lyme. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex
